name: Fram Fruit Bubble 2
description:
Fram Fruit Bubble 2 is an interesting match-3 shooter game of farm fruits. Wonder through the challenging puzzle and joyous adventure land gives you real fun shooting experience!
Features:

Classic match 3 fruits shooter game
Enjoy your farm harvest with juicy and bubble fruits
Ear soothing music and wonderful display of graphics
Match and pop fruits and clear the board
